name: Lime Green Skunk
description: Happy and relaxed, Lime Green Skunk is the laid-back daughter of Super Skunk and Northern Lights. The “Lime Green” description holds true for both its coloring and aroma. This strain features vibrant lime-colored leaves with a hefty amount of burnt orange hairs. The taste is a strong, sweet citrus, and the smell is equally as tropical. Great for daytime smoking, LGS produces sativa-like energizing effects while still providing a calm and floaty buzz.
attributes_title: Happy, Uplifted, Relaxed, Focused, Euphoric, Eye Pressure, Headaches, Depression, Fatigue, Lack of Appetite, Dry Eyes, Headache, Dry Mouth, Paranoid, Dizzy
